title: 10/28/2021 DPS Hour 3 Jay Glazer
itunes:title: 10/28/2021 DPS Hour 3 Jay Glazer
description:
Jason and Mike talk more about tonight’s pivotal NFL matchup between the Packers and the Cardinals, plus their thoughts on a supposed trade that would have sent Jimmy Garoppolo from San Francisco back to New England. Fox Sports NFL Insider Jay Glazer joins the show for all the latest out of the league as get closer to the trade deadline, and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
